movies.title: Hotel Rwanda
movies.plot: Inspired by true events, this film takes place in Rwanda in the 1990s when more than a million Tutsis were killed in a genocide that went mostly unnoticed by the rest of the world. Hotel owner Paul Rusesabagina houses over a thousand refuges in his hotel in attempt to save their lives.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 45 nominations.

studios.title: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa

events.title: Rwandan president Juv√©nal Habyarimana is killed

movies.title: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
movies.plot: Nerdy accountant Harold and his irrepressible friend, Kumar, get stoned watching television and find themselves utterly bewitched by a commercial for White Castle. Convinced there must be one nearby, the two set out on a late-night odyssey that takes them deep into New Jersey. Somehow, the boys manage to run afoul of rednecks, cops and even a car-stealing Neil Patrick Harris before getting anywhere near their beloved sliders.

movies.title: Snowden
movies.plot: CIA employee Edward Snowden leaks thousands of classified documents to the press.

events.title: Edward Snowden meets Laura Poitras and Glenn Greenwald
Glenn Greewald's first Snowden article, on mass surveillance by the US government of its people, is published
